short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your delivery and order numbers in online shops. This may help you to manage orders when you have more than two.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your delivery and order numbers in online shops.
On right click you're able to add new order number. This may help you to manage multiple shops orders. When you have more than two coming orders it is difficult to keep in mind which number you should say on call or whatever.
Also you can connect telegram bot and instantly get delivery number on you phone. Deleting also working from chat bot.

On any requests contact me on telegram @luzhkov.
Check it now!
